msg_main_menu.en:
Welcome to InnoWashing bot. With this bot you can: 
 - Find free washing machine or drier 
 - Get notified, when your washing or drying is finished.

msg_request_laundry_id.en: Please, enter laundry identifier (e.g. 42 means 4th building 2nd floor)

msg_notify_me.en:
Enter equipment id, which is a combination of building number, floor and order number. 
For instance, for 2nd building 3rd floor, 3rd device (from the door) it is 233.

msg_notification_created.en: Ok, you will be notified, when your process is finished.

msg_unexpected_laundry_id.en: This laundry is temporarily unavailable. Please, enter another one.

msg_id_number_error.en: Identifier must contain only digits. Please, try again.

msg_washing_started.en: Washing machine is unlocked. I will notify you, when washing is complete.

msg_notify_on_release.en: Ok, you will be notified when equipment will be released

msg_ask_for_reserve.en: Do you want to make a reservation? In this case you will be put in the queue, which has priority right to use the equipment.

msg_reserved.en: Okay. You will be notified, when it is your turn. Please, note, that you will have only 7 minutes to start washing in priority mode.
